name: Sudoku ◆
description:
The most intuitive, polished, and enjoyable Sudoku game in the App Store, fully featured with classic gameplay and an endless supply of Sudoku puzzles. Enjoy the sleekest and most modern Sudoku available with simplistic designs for a relaxing brain exercise.

Use deduction and logic to solve puzzles and aim to achieve perfect games without using hints. Test your puzzle-solving skills and rank up from easy to expert level.

Play both relaxing and challenging puzzles to improve your concentration, focus, and memory. Your progress is saved so you can return to your game anytime without interruption. What are you waiting for? Download and try it out now!

1. Fully customizable board for a personalized play experience
- Choose between round or square cells
- Color customization for up to 90 different combinations

2. Great for beginners!
- Simple controls for easy gameplay
- Hints, Notes, Auto-complete
- Toggle helpful settings like Move Suggest or Quick Mode
- Learn to play with How-to-Play

3. Track puzzle progress and earn stars
- Stats page to track and improve personal times
- Complete perfect games to collect stars
- Easy, Medium, Hard & Expert difficulties for those wanting a challenge

4. iPhone X/XS/XR and iPad support with HD retina graphics
- Visually appealing interface with colorful animations
- Enjoy Sudoku across all your devices!

Thank you for downloading Sudoku. For fast and friendly support, email us at contact@maplemedia.io. We'd love to hear from you.
